banner.line1: There are 24 million people with physical disabilities in China,

goal.title: What we do？
goal.content: Through making economical and simple 3D printing mechanical prosthetics, and open source and dissemination of this technology, the Hands-On program hopes to help millions of young children with physical disabilities in China.

step1.title: Register prosthetic needs information
step1.content: we will match prosthetic designers and volunteers for young children with different physical disability

step2.title: Design customized prosthetic
step2.content: based on the collected data, we will design the appropriate model for every young child

step3.title: Produced prosthetic through our volunteer community network
step3.content: we create prosthetics for demanders through a network of volunteers across the country

promise.title: We promise:
promise.content: All prosthetics will be donated free of charge to those in need
